Package controllers

Class dashBoardController

java.lang.Object
controllers.dashBoardController
public class dashBoardController
extends java.lang.Object
This class acts as a controller for the dashBoard.fxml It is the simulator dashboard which allows users to access the various features of the simulation

    • getAwayModeLight

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<java.time.LocalTime>> getAwayModeLight()
      getter awayModeLight map which store the key of the room name and the value it is array of start time to open and time to close
      Returns:
      Map of AwayMode, string is the room name arraylist is start and end time

    • setAwayModeLight

      public void setAwayModeLight​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<java.time.LocalTime>> awayModeLight)

      Parameters:
      awayModeLight - map of awaymode, string room name, array list of start time and end time

      public void toggleSimulation​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Turn on and Turn off Simulation when simulation on, the time could adjust by the using time slider when simulation is off set back to default which is 1
      Parameters:
      event - when on off simulation is toggle
